title: Talking About Mental Health
summary: Depression Sucks.  There is no doubt.  People who are depressed need and deserve compassion and understanding...

title: Adding Github-Style Markdown Alerts to Eleventy
summary: I often have occasion to come back to a blog post and add some kind of update.  Maybe I changed my mind or someone offered some new information I hadn't seen at the time of writing.  Up until now I would just add updates willy-nilly; sometimes they'd be at the start, sometimes the end, sometimes in bold, sometimes not...

title: Tracking Bear upvotes from my Cabin
summary: Tapping into the Bear upvote button to track events with external analytics
